name: Music_2522.wav
keywords: ['pop rock', 'female voice', 'moderate tempo', 'rock drums', 'sound of folding paper', 'no other instruments', 'happy mood']
caption: This pop rock song features a female voice singing the main melody. The song starts off with the sound of folding paper. Then the voice starts singing. This is accompanied by rock drums playing the kick drum. The snare is struck at every alternate count. The reverb effect is added to the percussion. There are no other instruments in this song. This song has a happy mood. This song can be played in an intro scene of a coming-of-age movie.
